about_the_game: Armadillo Assault is the perfect game to play with friends and enjoy some casual, action-packed fun! Armadillo Assault re-creates that classic local multiplayer experience, online! Armadillo Assault was inspired by many diverse game experiences and has influences from old school local multiplayer games, classic retro platformers and family friendly fighter games. Armadillo Assault features support for online PvP multiplayer, with port forwarding enabled for the host player, with up to 8 players in a game lobby, with gameplay designed to be easy for everyone to play. Each match features a classic arsenal of weapons to be collected, as well as powerful and fun power-ups spawning throughout the map to keep things fresh and interesting. Armadillo Assault includes classic features of some of those great old school multiplayer experience like Death Match, King of the Hill and Capture the Flag!

short_description: Armadillo Assault is a multiplayer, action-platformer shooter, inspired by the glory days of couch multiplayer fun. Re-creating the magic of local multiplayer in an online environment, Armadillo Assault offers a unique experience for players looking to have action-packed group fun with friends!
